statements: SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, player_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT feedback_id, player_id, comment FROM feedback ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, rating, created_at FROM feedback WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY player_id, game_id;
SELECT feedback_id, player_id, game_id FROM feedback WHERE player_id = 100 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4 AND game_id IN (3, 5, 7) ORDER BY rating DESC, created_at ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) as total_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_feedback >= 3 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) as average_rating, MIN(rating) as min_rating, MAX(rating) as max_rating FROM feedback WHERE game_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, AVG(rating) as avg_rating FROM feedback GROUP BY player_id HAVING avg_rating > 4 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback;
SELECT player_id, feedback FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE rating > 4.0;
SELECT player_id, feedback, rating FROM PlayerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM PlayerFeedback;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM GameReviews GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT player_id, rating FROM PlayerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameReviews WHERE player_id = 1234 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM GameReviews GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(review_id) > 3;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM PlayerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, player_name, feedback_text, rating FROM PlayerFeedback;
SELECT game_id, game_name, developer, release_date FROM VirtualRealityGames ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, review_text, rating, date_posted FROM GameReviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT game_id, game_name, developer FROM VirtualRealityGames WHERE developer LIKE 'A%';
SELECT review_id, game_id, review_text FROM GameReviews ORDER BY game_id ASC, date_posted DESC;
SELECT player_name, feedback_text, rating FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT review_text, rating, date_posted FROM GameReviews WHERE game_id = 101 ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT game_name, developer, release_date FROM VirtualRealityGames WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, rating FROM PlayerFeedback JOIN GameReviews ON PlayerFeedback.player_name = GameReviews.player_id WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT game_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM GameReviews JOIN VirtualRealityGames ON GameReviews.game_id = VirtualRealityGames.game_id GROUP BY game_name ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, creation_date FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text, creation_date FROM player_feedback ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT game_name, genre, release_date FROM virtual_reality_game WHERE developer = 'XYZ Studios';
SELECT review_text, review_date, rating FROM review WHERE player_id = 2 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM review WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text, creation_date FROM player_feedback WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_name, genre, release_date FROM virtual_reality_game WHERE genre = 'Adventure' ORDER BY release_date;
SELECT game_feedback.player_id, feedback_text, helpful_votes FROM game_feedback INNER JOIN player_feedback ON game_feedback.player_id = player_feedback.player_id;
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT game_name, genre, release_date FROM games WHERE genre = 'RPG';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE review_id = 1;
SELECT developer_name, company_name, founding_date FROM developers ORDER BY founding_date;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating, review_date FROM reviews WHERE game_id = 1 AND rating < 4;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE registration_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_name, genre FROM games WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY game_name ASC;
SELECT developer_name, company_name FROM developers WHERE founding_date < '2000-01-01';
